channel.title: Need a Development team [Next Generation] [Windows VPS] [317] [CURSES/YAK/OVL]
channel.description:
Hello Morparscape, I'm currently looking for Java programmers & Web designers. Hosting the server 24/7 on a Windows VPS. Not much RAM but if needed I'll upgrade it at anytime. [See bottom for Application]
Recently changed from 634 to 317 with 634 items. (Sorry for everyone who got mad at me, new to the morparscape community)
Mod(s): 0/5 Admin(s): 1/3 Co-Owner: 1/1 Owner: 1/1 ----------------- GFX Artist: 1/1 Web designer: 0/1 Developer(s):1/*
-----------------
Already Pre-released the server but atleast need 1 more developer at the moment as me & my current developer live in opposite time zones.
Ill be adding screenshots tommorow.
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/kbepgp.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/10qlzlw.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2d1lnxc.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/1zl38tj.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/281hyc.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/24ffr6h.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/30vp54k.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/21njmsg.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/20uakjc.jpg[/img]
Application:
What is your name? What is your age? Where are you from? Do you have ventrilo/mic? How long have you been codeing? What languages do you know? What kind of projects have you worked on previously? Can you create use Photoshop proficiently? Can you setup forums? Why do you want to join NextGen? Any other additional information or skills to offer?
